value.string: # get day of week and skip processing if it is Sat/Sun
# find weekends and format them according to opsDaily format
# format dates according to Auth.net file name format
# format dates according to OpsDaily file name format
#  if it is Monday, copy entries from weekennd files into Monday's Ops daily file
#  Also copy saturday' auth.net entries (carry forwards of friday's file) into monday's auth.net file
# Log process log info to RPA metrics file

value.expression: $varCurrDate1$, N/A, Billing Compare Refund, N/A, N/A
